mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Sorry to hear of his attack of rheumatism on his own account and that of the public; thinks he will have to go on as soon as able; believes that immediately on pacification with England, he should go on a vessel dispatched to France.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1809 May 25, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia], to [Wilson Cary] Nicholas, n.p.
